name: Fire Out!
description:
Play as a hardened firefighter, the only brave enough to face the raging fires!
- Rescue vulnerable citizens
- Use various abilities to ensure your survival
- Constantly adapt your strategy to the evolving danger

Made in 48 hours for GMTK Game Jam 2020 for the theme: "Out of Control"

Teams :
- Christopher Harvey
- Olivier Therrien-Lefebvre
- Jacob Rouleau
- Olivier Doyon
- Geoffrey Sénémaud
